name: Abby
info:
• 简体中文名: 埃比
  • 别名: Abigail "Abby" Anderson
  • 别名: 艾比
  • 别名: 埃比·安德森
  • 别名: Abby Anderson
  • 别名: アビー
  • 性别: 女
detail: Abigail "Abby" Anderson is one of the main playable protagonists of The Last of Us Part II and the central antagonist from Ellie's perspective. She is voiced and motion captured by Laura Bailey.

jobs.name: The Last of Us: Part II
